title: doc: Over escaping in Writing Web Applications article
body:
by **fericean**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Go to http://golang.org/doc/articles/wiki/#tmp_151
2. Check that every variable is escaped thorough |html filter


What is the expected output?
It should not be escaped because html/template auto-escapes variables

What do you see instead?
It is escaped like for text/template
